publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3586 Mr Adam Ingram: Heartstart-That the Parliament welcomes Heartstart, the British Heart Foundation's Scottish schools initiative, which aims to develop emergency life support training programmes in our schools; congratulates those schools throughout Scotland that have already signed up to this programme and have benefited from teacher training free of charge and generous grants for training equipment, and urges local authorities to ensure that those schools that have not yet affiliated are encouraged to do so, in order to provide young people with invaluable lifesaving skills.
S1M-3586 Heartstart (lodged on 15 November 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-3586 Heartstart (lodged on 15 November 2002) Linda Fabiani*, Michael Matheson*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3586 Heartstart (lodged on 15 November 2002) Scott Barrie*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Bill Butler*
S1M-3586 Heartstart (lodged on 15 November 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Nora Radcliffe*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Shona Robison*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-3586 Heartstart (lodged on 15 November 2002) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-3586 Heartstart (lodged on 15 November 2002) Andrew Wilson*
